basics.name: Xueshan Wang
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Verderia NGO
work.summary: Managing and maintaining the organization's WordPress website while implementing performance optimizations through CloudFlare and ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
highlights: Implemented CloudFlare for improved website performance and security
Managed WordPress site maintenance and content updates
Successfully configured and maintained DNS settings
responsibilities: Developed and maintained the organization's WordPress website
Managed domain registration and DNS configuration through CloudFlare
Provided technical support and WordPress solutions for day-to-day operations
Implemented website updates and security patches
Collaborated with team members to ensure website content alignment with goals
achievements: Enhanced website security and performance through CloudFlare integration

work.name: LotusHabits
work.summary: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop responsive web applications using React and Redux, with a focus on enhancing user experience through improved content rendering and Firebase integration.
highlights: Implemented advanced Markdown rendering system to improve content readability
Built robust user authentication system using Firebase
Managed complex application state with Redux
responsibilities: Developed and maintained React-based web applications with Redux state management
Implemented user authentication and data persistence using Firebase
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement responsive web applications
Enhanced content display by implementing advanced Markdown rendering capabilities
achievements: Improved user experience by developing an enhanced Markdown rendering system
Successfully implemented and maintained secure user authentication flow
Established efficient state management patterns using Redux

work.name: Song Tea
work.summary: Provided excellent customer service at a to-go bubble tea shop, handling all aspects of beverage preparation and customer interactions.
highlights: Prepared high-quality bubble tea beverages according to customer specifications
Delivered exceptional customer service in a fast-paced to-go environment
Maintained cleanliness and organization of work station and equipment
responsibilities: Greeted and assisted customers with menu selections and special requests
Prepared various bubble tea drinks including fruit teas, milk teas, and specialty beverages
Operated point-of-sale system for order processing and payment handling
Maintained inventory of ingredients and supplies
achievements: Consistently maintained high customer satisfaction in busy to-go environment
Mastered preparation of diverse menu items efficiently

work.name: New Kims Wei Restaurant
work.summary: Performed multiple roles in a busy restaurant environment including cashier duties, phone orders, food packaging, front desk operations, and kitchen assistance.
highlights: Successfully managed multiple responsibilities across front-of-house and kitchen operations
Handled customer transactions and phone orders with accuracy and efficiency
Supported kitchen operations including food preparation and frying duties
responsibilities: Operated cash register and processed customer payments accurately
Answered phone calls and took customer orders for takeout and delivery
Packaged food orders ensuring proper presentation and completeness
Managed front desk operations and greeted customers
Assisted with kitchen duties including frying and food preparation
achievements: Developed strong multitasking abilities while maintaining quality service
Gained comprehensive restaurant operation experience across multiple departments

projects.name: GameBoyJS
projects.description: A modern JavaScript implementation of a Game Boy emulator built for the web using ES6+ features, designed as a comprehensive learning project to understand computer architecture and emulation principles.

projects.name: Svg2SvgIcon Converter
projects.description: A pure client-side online tool that converts SVG code or files into Material-UI (MUI) SvgIcon components ready for use in React projects, featuring real-time preview and intelligent parsing capabilities.

projects.name: Kaspersky To 1Password
